values:
FrIdAy* I didnt do nothing at all! It was a bad night! I was really upset so I called Sarah *&* she said she would call me back -never did- so I called Avery *&* he wasnt home! So I sat there *&* cried til ChelC Vann called me *&* made me feel better! I went to bed at like 11! -yeah Ima loser-

SaTuRdAy* Didnt do nuttin! just went *&* got something to eat then took a shower *&* went to Sarahs house w/ a towel on my head -like always-! So me *&* her *&* ChelC got ready *&* I straightened my hair! Then Casey *&* Jon came over here for a lil while! Then they left *&* Clay *&* Josh said they wasnt comin  over! So we went *&* watched Butterfly Effect! Then they called *&* said they were ridin by! So Josh L Clay Josh D *&* Landon all ride by here! So we all went outside w/ them *&* just messed around! fun*e stuff! But we 4got to tell Sarahs mom that they were comin by so we all got in trouble *&* she made us come in! Then we finished the movie *&* at like 11 Casey *&* Jon come back *&* are runnin around Sarahs house knockin on the windows *&* stuff scarin us! But Sarahs mom put the alarm on so we had to talk to them out the window *lOl*! yeah we were playin Romeo *& Juliet! so they left *&* we just acted stupid! Then they came back 2 more times *&* climbed thru Sarahs window *&* got mud all over the carpet! It was o0o fun*e! So Sarah fell asleep *&* me *&* ChelC stayed up til like 5!

ToDaY* Corey woke me *&* ChelC up every 5 minutes playin w/ our hair *&* standin on me! So we finally got up at 11 *&* went *&* woke Sarah up! *&* we didnt do nuttin really! Then Casey *&* Jon cAmE bAcK over here *&* found a snake in the yard *&* they played w/ it for 4ever *&* were tryin to throw it on us! cur-a-z! So yeah me *&* ChelC are bout to go home *&* all! So Im OuT
♥

**Clay Im still mad at you!! *&* you know why!**

I woke up this mornin *&* I just felt like crap! So thats pretty much what I looked like! ugh I swear my Drivers Ed teacher like seriously HaTeS me! I ono why either! He gets on to me every freakin day! *&* we had a firedrill 2day *&* so we were goin back in from it *&* me *&* keri run down the hall so he wouldnt see us *&* we walked around for a lil while! So when we got back in the classroom he snapped all over me! Not keri! just me! *&* I was like wtc! It was cur-a-z! Hes out to get me! But newayz!the rest of the day was pretty boring! I think we're going out to eat 2night!

2day was pretty average! School was ...... school *lOl*! No I have fun bein stupid at school so yanno! I got made fun of bc of my shirt *thanx Joe*! But yanno its all good! We went *&* got Ash pics back so she can send them to Adam! Ive messed ^ one of my back teeth from eatin ice so0o much! But you know dumb me still eats it *lOl*!  I saw Channonz daddy at Wal*Mart -goh I miss him-! But yeah *&* Im goin to Church 2night!

MuCh <3

*&* the rest has just been school! Today was fun tho! We had a big mess w/ the Sophmores *&* Freshman in the Library so me *&* Keri just push them all !I mean everyone of them! it was fun*e! *&* we had our Grade Level Assemblys *&* I didnt have newhere to sit so I layed across Billy Keri Sonya Cassandra *&* ChelC! until someone got up! *&* we didnt do ne work either! Woke ^ late.
Went to school.
Saw everyone.
*iNcLuDiNg* the 900 million freshman.
Going to Wal*Mart 2night for Binders *&* stuff. ♥

yeah my computer is a whore so0o it breaks all the time!

ThUrSdAy* dawn took me n sarah to get our nails done! it was so0o much fun we were in there for like 3 hours! yeah it was cur-a-z!

FrIdAy* I got up at 1o:3o *&* I went in Ashleys room *&* asked her what time it is*I ono why bc I have an alarm clock on my tv* yeah I ono! So I went back to my room *&* fell asleep til 11:45 *lazy thing*! So yeah I bathed Taylor *&* Ash bathed Tiger *&* then I got in the shower *&* right when I got out Sarah called *&* told me Dawn was on her way to come get me *&* I was like wtc! So I threw some clothes in my bags *&* stuff *&* listened to Ashley *&* Donnie fight! Alwayz amusing! then I came over here *&* finished gettin ready! So yeah everybody got here *&* it was just cur-a-z! I had fun tho! Some ppl didnt but o0o well! So yeah some ppl left *&* we went swimming! well I didnt plan on swimmin but Casey *&* Landon pulled my big butt in! so0o yanno! then I got into it w/ Avery! ugh  not going there! *&* we watched 9 Lives at like 3 so we're just stayin up all night! mk well Im gonna go mingle w/ Jareds hoes! holla balla

another bad day! lovely I know! I woke up at freakin 9:oo to the beautiful sound of one *the only one* of Donnies friend calling! So Ashley politely hung ^ on him! *&* the stupid idiot calls back 17 times! 17 freaking times! Then he comes to our house *its prolly 9:45 now* *&* bangs on the front door *&* every window on the front side of our house! *&* stupid Donnie 4gets to lock the back door! So that fool just walks up in our house! *&* yell at the top of his lungs! He better be glad that I was to lazy to get up! Bc I would have hurt his feelings! So I got ^ at 11 *&* come to find out that Donnies friend didnt even close the back door *&* the cats are outside! The kittens are on the porch scared to death *&* I cant find my old cat for bout 2 hours! *Iwasnothappy*! So my day was messed ^ b4 noon! Then me n Ash went to Wal*Mart! Then came home *&* watched TV all day bc I feel like crap! Bc Im late! *&* it sux! So when my mom got home we went to Cracker Barrell *&* I was so0o xcited bc they only have Chicken Pot Pie on Wednesdays! Well come to find out they only serve it for LuNcH! wtc? thats bout as gay as it  gets! But to top it off they dont have chicken *&* dumplins either! I seriously wanted to get ^ *&* leave! But my mom wouldnt let me! Coleman sat down right beside us *goofy goofy kid*! so we talked to him! *&* when I walked in the door I almost fell! I ono what it is! I just got dizzy *&* lightheaded! yeah Im just retarded! ugh *&* I missed Quints too! *&* now Im stuck watchin freakin Full House! Who gave them a whole f-in hour I dont know! Im out

I went to bed at 1o:45 last night *&* I didnt wake ^ til 11:3o! aint that a mess? lazy thing! thats alot of sleep! Im tellin ya! So I got ^ *&* just at around! Ash n Em asked me if I wanted to go w/ them but they went all over Gods creation *&* I didnt feel like it! So Ash got home bout 1:3o or 2! *&* we decided to go eat @ Rallys then go swim! But goin swimmin just never really happened! So when mom n Donnie got back we were gonna go to the moives! But if you know me then you know that my plans NeVeR work out! Bc Sarah had a cheer meetin *&* Avery wasnt answerin his phone! But we had to wait for Donnie to get back from pickin my mom ^ at work bc hes lazy self hasnt fixed Ash car yet! which comes to me as no surprise! So Ash was goin to Ems *&* me mom n donnie were gonna go eat! But of course Donnie starts his usual bitchin *&* gripin *&* he just wanted to get something *&* bring it home *&* I was like heck naw I know I didnt just get all cute to go get something *&* bring it home! *&* I didnt marry him so I dont have to listen to him bitch at me! So me bein the bi that I am I bitch back at him! So we go get something for him take him back home *&* me mom n Ash go pay Em *&* Meagan a lovely visit! which is always amusing! *&* Ash got some of Meagans pants! *&* we had a nice discussion bout ppls butts! *lOl* I wasnt included bc I dont have one but yanno it was fun*e! So we left there *&* went to Captain D's! I ono what it is bout us n Captain D's! I just dont know! So yeah we came home *&* me n Ash cleaned out or closets! which makes me sad bc I dont like giving away my clothes! is that greedy? o0o well I dont care! *&* Ive been sittin here chewin on my straw for the past hour *lOl*! ugh *&* I made myself sick bc I had to pee *&* then I thought about how everyone in this house sits on the same toilet! *&* I dont know I just grossed myself out! ew its just disgusting! But Im out on that thought!

I got ^ at 11 something *&* got in the shower *&* talked to Sarah til Avery got here at bout 2! We just layed in there acting stupid! Then we went to Rally's *nastiest cheeseburgers EvEr* ugh it was disgusting! So we ate *&* we had to wait for Donnie to get back from pickin my mom ^ at work! *&* while we were waitin Avery let me curl his hair! omg so0o cute! he looked like Shirley Temple! I loved it *lOl*! Then when they got back we went to my Daddys house! It was fun*e! Saydie sneezed all over Avery *lOl*! Then we left there to go to Sonic *&* Nolan flagged us down so we stopped *&* talked to him n Jeremey for a few! So then we went to Sonic *&* got Ice Cream *&* laughed at the Biker kids who were there for Bike Nite! fun*e stuff! Then we drove around Hueytown for a lil while! Then we stopped by the store, came home, ran some BioFreeze to my mawmaws house *&* talked to them for a lil while! Then we came back here *&* watched Road Rules *so pissed that Kina went home* *&* Avery just left! But Im outie! HoLlA hOeZ
♥

*(( Let me catch ^ ))*

FrIdAy* Got up at 6:3o got ready went *&* go breakfast then went to Registration! Saw EvErYbOdY! I finally got to see Brittanys baby Kaylee! goh shes a doll! I have classes w/ maybe 4 ppl! sux! But at least I got a top locker! So Sarah has to move in again this year! Then we left the school *&* went to Shanes *&* LoriO *&* Shane talked then we left his house *&* went to get Dawn *&* we all went to Guad! ugh I felt so sick! So we went back to Dawns bc Shane was cuttin grass at Sarahs house *&* LoriO didnt feel like foolin w/ him! But we got bored so we went back to Sarahs! *&* swam! for 4ever! *haha* me *&* sarah love that tire! So we got out *&* we had to hurry ^ *&* leave so Sarahs mom wouldnt make us watch Corey! So we came back here *&* me n ash n sarah went to Taco Bell *&* Burger King! came home *&* decided we wanted to go swim so we put our bathin suits on *&* decided to go see Avery! But we had to wait for Em to get here! So we went *&* saw Avery *&* his puppy bit *&* scratched the crap outta me! He better be glad hes cute! So on the way home we decided not to go swim! So me mom ash sarah *&* em all go to Wal*mart! We looked like straight up crap! *&* to make it worse we saw Ashley *&* Brent *&* Chase *&* Britney Leach *&* Daniel in there! yup thats my luck! So we got sheets for our new beds! Came home *&* acted stupid while my mom n donnie put our beds up! it was fun!

SaTuRdAy* Sarah *&* Em went home at 12 something! *&* we loaded our old beds in the back of the truck to take to Adams aunt! *&* it started pourin down rain *&* donnie got pissed! me n ashley just laughed! So we took the beds to Adams aunt *&* talked to them for a bit! Then we came home *&* dropped Donnie off went *&* ate at Captain D's *&* went to Goodys! I was gettin pissy! I hate shoppin for pants! Id much rather just walk around naked! but yanno! So we came home *&* just layed around! Then at 9:3o me n Ash wanted Dairy Queen so Val wanted to go then we made mawmaw go *yeah it was cute..she was xcited to go* then we came home *&* me n mom watched the Crocidile Hunter for 2 hours then I got on the phone w/ Avery *&* she went to bed!

ToDaY* I got up *&* me n Ash went to Dairy Queen *yeah we're addicted* *&* we came home *&* then went to Dads house *&* just talked w/ them n stuff! Then we came back here *&* we've just been layin around ever since!

Well yeah Tuesday night I didnt go to sleep! just thinkin bout too much stuff! So I got off the phone w/ Avery at 4 sumthin then just sat in Sarahs floor thinkin til bout 5:3o when her cable started workin again! *&* I watched Power Rangers til 6 sumthin when Corey came in there w/ me! So we watched Pokemon for an hour,Stanley,Aladdin *&* Tom n Jerry! then we got all the magazines outta Sarahs room *&* I know we looked at them for bout 2 hours! *lOl*! Then we went to swim at bout 1o *&* the water was ice cold so he swam *&* I watched him *&* then I went *&* woke ^ Sarah! We were going to get in but we never managed too! We just sat there w/ out feet in the water! Then we just layed around til 12 *&* her mom called *&* told us to get ready! So we were on our way to Gutheries *&* Goody's! *&* Of CoUrSe LoriO -Sarahs mom- is speeding! So we get *&* pulled over *&* she gets a ticket! *lOl* she was so mad! So we went *&* ate at Guthries went to Goodys *&* LoriO was lookin at dresses *&* me n Corey were dancin -yeah we're dumb- *&* then he started chasing me! So LoriO was trying on the dresses *&* me n Corey get into it! We were playin at 1st then he started pissin me off! So we fought for about 20 mins! Then we left Goody's *&* went by Dairy Queen! *&* yes me *&* LoriO got the Brownie Blatter! It was great! ! So we went to Shanes house to show him the dresses! *&* Sarah *&* LoriO had them on *&* they pranced around in them for a lil while! *&* We were watchin the Dr. Phil show *&* talkin bout how we need a new pair of boys -haha- when Corey started it up again! So he got in trouble *&* got grounded! Then we went back to Sarahs *&* Dawn -Sarahs aunt- came over to see the dresses *&* she stayed for bout 2 hours *&* we were all in Sarahs room just talkin *&* actin stupid! So me n Sarah left w/ Dawn..came to her house put our stuff down then went to Taco Bell! We watched Quintuplets *&* Simple Life 2 then Sarah got on the phone w/ Bryan! *&* me n her were play fightin *&* actin stupid! *&* she was layin on top of me bc I wouldnt move so she pushes me off the couch *&* we're just pinchin n slappin n bitin *lOl* it was so0o fun*e! So BooBoo -Sarahs uncle- made Sarah go sit in the bedroom *&* locked her in there! *lOl*! So BooBoo went to bed bout 11 sumthin *&* we were just sittin in there w/ Dawn talkin n stuff! I was playin a Solitaire like pocket game ugh I got so pissed at it! I wanted to throw it! *&* Sarah got off the phone w/ Bryan *&* I called Avery to tell him goodnight bc I tHoUgHt I was bout to go bed! But that didnt happen! We played cards *&* Auburn Monopoly til 2 sumthin! *&* then we watched a movie called 8 seconds...goh it was so0o sad! I cried *lOl*! So Sarah fell asleep at 5 *&* me n Dawn fell asleep at 5:45! *&* we woke ^ *&* they were goin shoppin but I didnt feel good! So they took me home *&* Im locked out of my freaking house so I was pissed!! I had to walk over here to my grandparents *&* now Im just waitin for them to come home bc I cant get in the house!! But Im outie

It was fun*e I got ^ *&* walked down the hall *&* Corey ran down the hall yellin*&* he goes Andrea hey Andrea then he stopped *&* stared at me *&* he was like you need to fix your hair *&* just walked off! I found that pretty amusing! We were gonna go swim but we went *&* stuck our feet in the water *&* just sat there! Ive thought bout alot of things 2day! I was thinkin bout Channon earlier! I really miss her! But yanno how that is! I talked to Katelyn earlier *&* Richard told her the same crap he told me! So he told me that he was messed ^ the night he told me all that! *&* I didnt believe a thing that he told me neways! So w/e! *&* he told Katelyn that he never loved me *&* all this crap *&* just told her completely diff crap then what he told me! *&* it really did hurt my feelings but hes a jackass *&* a liar so I dont really care! I got off the phone w/ Avery not to long ago! We talked bout alot of stuff which was really kewl! I feel bad tho bc I kinda took him away from 2 of his friends! Dont really know what to do bout all that! I cant sleep *&* it sux! ♥

But yeah then me *&* ashley went all the way to freakin Hueytown bc we saw on a commercial that Dairy Queen had this new brownie shake thing *&* we get there *&* they laughed at us *&* told us that they have no idea what we were talkin bout! So I came home *&* got in the shower *&* ashley comes in there *&* tells me that Avery *&* Joe are on their way! *&* Im like grreat Avery loves seein my hair in a towel *haha*! yeah so0o we watched the Butterfly Effect *&* just acted stupid all day! it was great! we bonded! *lOl* yeah *&* now Im at Sarahs eatin pizza!</FONT>

Then my mom woke me up at 8:3o *&* made me go get in my bed! then I got up *&* took a shower *&* talk to Avery a lil bit to see if he wanted to go off w/ us but when I called back he never answered! I tried to talk my mom into gettin the kind w/ purple hippos on them but she wouldnt! *&* I wanted to go sit on all the toilets *&* try 'em out but she wasnt to happy bout that either! so0o all in all I had a fun filled 2 hours of gettin on my moms nerves! We also saw this kid that we used to babysit *&* so me n ashley make a fool of ourselves *&* go ask him if his name was Brent! well he remembered my mom but not me n ashley *lOl*! so we laughed bout that! then we came home *&* I got on here *&* talked to K*la! <3 her! then we went swimmin came home took our showers then went to Shoneys! *&* Ashley showed me where Meagan Crane lives -yanno bc I care- *rolls eyes*! then we went to Wal*Mart *&* put our film in from where we went WhiteWaterRaftin last month *lOl* *&* I got another poster of my sexcman! *&* now Im watchin some movie on Disney Channel!

-k- well this weekend was so0o fun! We left Friday morning at bout 9 *&* we were gonna go rafting down a river called the Hawassee bc we stayed right beside it but it was raining *&* we got there to late! So0o since it was raining there were big puddles in our yard in front of the cabins so me *&* all the girls go slidin in puddles *&* we just ran around *&* got all dirty yanno all that good stuff! *&* the boys talked me n Kristen to float down the Hawassee in life jackets so we thought it would be fun.....until we found out it was 52 degrees *&* we had to float for over a mile *lOl*! We were freezing but it was really fun too! *&* Saturday we left at 10 to go to North Carolina to raft down the Nantahala * -Nanna-hey-la- * *lOl* *&* it took 2 hours to get there *&* it was 8 miles long so0o it took bout 3 hours..I loved it! It was Tyler Josh Me Kristen *&* Ashley *&* Kristens uncle in our Raft *&* the 2 stupid boys decide to jump in *&* the water was like 45 degrees o0o it was cur-a-z! *&* they started water wars w/ all the other ppl in the rafts so0o we got soaked! The Hawassee is like a Class 1 river *&* the Nantahala is like a Class 3 *&* the most dangerous river is a Class 6 so0o it was grreat! But Im tired *&* Im bout to go call Sarah so0o Im outie!
